fxInfo_clarification: These are ordinalized versions of the V-Dem equal protection index. The original index ranges from 0 to 1. These transformations offer three different ordinal versions with three (_3C), four (_4C), and five (_5C) levels respectively.
fxInfo_question: How equal is the protection of rights and freedoms across social groups by the state?
name: e_v2xeg_eqprotec_3C /_4C /_5C
